languages.text: "Да, он... вдруг начал уходить в себя, отвечать колко, едко. Если раньше его шутки были простыми, то теперь они так и норовят укусить побольнее. А еще он стал... взрываться по каждой мелочи, указывать мне, что делать... а ведь он брат мне, не чужой..." {n}Выпалив все это, Мейв испуганно замирает — белая, как саван.{/n} "Простите мне мою несдержанность..."
languages.translation_comment: + можно реакт комп-ов из серии "не повезло с братом"

traits.locale_text: "Да, он... вдруг начал замыкаться в себе, отвечать колко, едко. Если раньше его шутки были простыми — но до чего же веселыми! — то теперь они так и норовят укусить побольнее. А еще он стал... взрываться по каждой мелочи, указывать мне, что делать. Как будто не я его любимая сестренка!" {n}Выпалив все это, Лидзи испуганно замирает — белая, как саван.{/n} "Простите мне мою несдержанность..."

languages.translation_comment: + можно реакт комп-ов из серии "не повезло с братом"

languages.text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."
languages.original_text: "Да, он... вдруг начал уходить в себя, отвечать колко, едко. Если раньше его шутки были простыми, то теперь они так и норовят укусить побольнее. А еще он стал... взрываться по каждой мелочи, указывать мне, что делать... а ведь он брат мне, не чужой..." {n}Выпалив все это, Мейв испуганно замирает — белая, как саван.{/n} "Простите мне мою несдержанность..."

"Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

"Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but oh so funny! Now there's always a nasty bite to them. And he's also started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about. As though I'm not his dear little Lidzy anymore!" {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

languages.text: “是的，他就像是……就像是突然变了个人一样。他开始回击别人，说些尖酸刻薄的话。他以前讲的笑话都很单纯，但现在的笑话却始终带着挖苦的意味。而且，他开始对每件小事大发雷霆，对我颐指气使……他可是我的亲哥哥……”{n}梅芙一口气说了这么说话之后，突然吓得僵在了原地，脸色惨白如纸。{/n}“我太缺乏克制了，请您原谅……”
languages.original_text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

traits.locale_text: “是的，他就像是……就像是突然变了个人一样。他开始回击别人，说些尖酸刻薄的话。他以前讲的笑话都很单纯，但现在的笑话却始终带着挖苦的意味。而且，他开始对每件小事大发雷霆，对我颐指气使……他可是我的亲哥哥……”{n}梅芙一口气说了这么说话之后，突然吓得僵在了原地，脸色惨白如纸。{/n}“我太缺乏克制了，请您原谅……”

languages.text: «Sí, fue como si... de repente se volvió retraído y empezó a insultar a la gente con comentarios mordaces. Antes sus chistes eran inocentes, pero luego se volvieron ofensivos. Además, saltaba por cualquier cosa y me mangoneaba mucho... Mi propio hermano...». {n}Tras decir esto, la chica se calla de repente y palidece.{/n} «Por favor, le ruego que disculpe mi exabrupto...».
languages.original_text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, fue como si... de repente se volvió retraído y empezó a insultar a la gente con comentarios mordaces. Antes sus chistes eran inocentes, pero luego se volvieron ofensivos. Además, saltaba por cualquier cosa y me mangoneaba mucho... Mi propio hermano...». {n}Tras decir esto, la chica se calla de repente y palidece.{/n} «Por favor, le ruego que disculpe mi exabrupto...».

languages.text: "Evet, sanki... Aniden içine kapandı ve insanları terslemeye, onlara alaycı, iğneleyici şeyler söylemeye başladı. Şakaları önceden basitti ama artık can yakıcı şeyler de söylüyor. En ufak şeylere patlamaya ve bana emirler yağdırmaya başladı... Öz kardeşim..." {n}Tüm bunları söyledikten sonra korkuyla donakalıyor, bembeyaz kesiliyor.{/n} "Ölçüsüzlüğümü bağışlayın..."
languages.original_text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, sanki... Aniden içine kapandı ve insanları terslemeye, onlara alaycı, iğneleyici şeyler söylemeye başladı. Şakaları önceden basitti ama artık can yakıcı şeyler de söylüyor. En ufak şeylere patlamaya ve bana emirler yağdırmaya başladı... Öz kardeşim..." {n}Tüm bunları söyledikten sonra korkuyla donakalıyor, bembeyaz kesiliyor.{/n} "Ölçüsüzlüğümü bağışlayın..."

languages.text: 「はい、彼は…突然彼自身の中に引きこもってしまったように思えました。人々に言い返したり、皮肉を言ったり、物事を酷評したりするようになりました。彼の冗談は以前はシンプルでしたが、今ではいつも意地悪なものになっています。そして、彼はすべての細々したことにまで激怒し、私の兄弟についても指図するようになりました…」{n}彼女はそこまで言うと、恐怖で縮み上がり、血の気がなくなった。{/n}「自制がきかなくて、申し訳ございません…」
languages.original_text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、彼は…突然彼自身の中に引きこもってしまったように思えました。人々に言い返したり、皮肉を言ったり、物事を酷評したりするようになりました。彼の冗談は以前はシンプルでしたが、今ではいつも意地悪なものになっています。そして、彼はすべての細々したことにまで激怒し、私の兄弟についても指図するようになりました…」{n}彼女はそこまで言うと、恐怖で縮み上がり、血の気がなくなった。{/n}「自制がきかなくて、申し訳ございません…」

languages.text: « Oui, il s'est comme... replié sur lui-même d'un seul coup. Il s'est mis à répondre méchamment. Ses plaisanteries autrefois anodines se sont transformées en sarcasmes cinglants, voire en remarques blessantes. Il explose à la moindre contrariété et me donne des ordres... Mon propre frère... » {n}Elle se fige soudain et devient livide de peur.{/n} « Pardonnez mon manque total de retenue... »
languages.original_text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, il s'est comme... replié sur lui-même d'un seul coup. Il s'est mis à répondre méchamment. Ses plaisanteries autrefois anodines se sont transformées en sarcasmes cinglants, voire en remarques blessantes. Il explose à la moindre contrariété et me donne des ordres... Mon propre frère... » {n}Elle se fige soudain et devient livide de peur.{/n} « Pardonnez mon manque total de retenue... »

languages.text: "Ja, er schien sich plötzlich ... in sich zurückzuziehen und fing an, schroff zu werden, sarkastische, gemeine Dinge zu sagen. Früher waren seine Witze einfach lustig, aber mittlerweile sind sie immer böse. Außerdem geht er wegen jeder Kleinigkeit an die Decke und kommandiert mich nur noch herum ... Mein eigener Bruder ..." {n}Nachdem sie all das gesagt hat, erstarrt sie vor Furcht und wird aschfahl.{/n} "Verzeiht mir meine fehlende Zurückhaltung ..."
languages.original_text: "Yes, he seemed to... retreat into himself all of a sudden, and he started snapping back at people, saying sarcastic, scathing things. His jokes were simple before, but now, there is always a nasty bite to them. And he's started exploding at every little thing and ordering me about... My own brother..." {n}Having said all this, she freezes in fear, turning white as a sheet.{/n} "Apologies for my lack of restraint..."
